deviceDiscovery.title: Device Discovery
deviceDiscovery.description: Enable to automatically discover Denon devices on your network. (Found devices will be listed in the homebridge log after the plugin has started. Ensure that your homebridge's log level is at least set to 'info' or enable the debug log below.)

ip.title: IP Address
ip.description: If your device has a static IP address, you can enter it here.

volumeLimitEnabled.title: Volume Limit
volumeLimitEnabled.description: When you set a volume limit, 100% volume in HomeKit will correspond to this percentage on your device.

volumeLimit.description: only has an effect if volume limit is enabled above

consoleLogEnabled.title: Console Log
consoleLogEnabled.description: Diverts the log messages directly to the console. This is only intended for debugging purposes.

consoleLogLevel.title: Log Level
consoleLogLevel.description: If console log is enabled, only log messages at this log level or below it will be displayed in the console.
